Clinical evidence shows that it improves patient outcomes (e.g., progression-free and overall survival) in individuals with this breast cancer subtype, which contradicts the hypothesis that it has “no effect.” Therefore, the hypothesis is refuted by consistent evidence that sacituzumab govitecan-hziy does indeed exert a beneficial effect on breast cancer patient outcomes.
